tasks.label: check-core-files
tasks.command: git ls-files telegram_bot.py osint_cli.py requirements.txt requirements_enhanced.txt directory_db.py data_breaches.py universal_search_system.py xosint_toolkit.py

tasks.label: verify-imports-2
tasks.command: C:/Users/test/Documents/phoneinfoga/.venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "import universal_search_system; import xosint_toolkit; import telegram_bot; import osint_cli; print('IMPORTS_OK')"

tasks.label: commit-full-python
tasks.command: git add universal_search_system.py xosint_toolkit.py templates tests sherlock_report.py test_different_numbers.py test_full_search.py test_real_data.py test_sherlock.py; git commit -m "Add core Python search modules, templates, and tests for full Telegram integration"; git push origin master

tasks.label: commit-and-push-clean
tasks.command: git add fix_phone_format.py import_directory_data.py load_all_data.py perfect_search.py phone_search_system.py phoneinfoga_python.py photo_search_system.py project.inlang pytest.ini sherlock_report.py; git commit -m add_python_modules; git push origin master
